content: You need to calculate the equivalent decimal value of the hexadecimal value "0xC5". However, you are not allowed to use the Integer.parseInt() method or any other built-in function to convert the hexadecimal value to decimal. You can only use basic arithmetic operators like addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division to perform the conversion. Can you provide the Java code to solve this challenge? Remember, your code should be able to handle any hexadecimal value and produce the correct decimal equivalent. Good luck!
